mapper.select: SELECT ADM_USR.ID , ADM_USR.NAME AS USER_NAME , ADM_USR.EMP_CODE , ADM_USR.AUTH_CODE , ADM_AUTH.VALUE AS AUTH_VALUE , ADM_USR.USE_YN , ADM_USR.REG_DATE , ADM_USR.EDIT_DATE , ADM_AUTH.NAME AS AUTH_NAME FROM ADM_USR_INFO ADM_USR , ADM_AUTH_INFO ADM_AUTH WHERE ADM_AUTH.SEQ_NO = ADM_USR.AUTH_CODE
